title: Need help League of Legends PATCHER not opening

replies.body:
Oh, fancy. A video. Usually we just get a text description. Nice wallpaper, too.

Have you tried opening it directly from the Riot Games/League of Legends folder? With admin privileges (on the usual one)?

Do you activate admin privileges by instructing the shortcut to "Open as an administrator..." or by actually changing the permissions of the executable to "Always open with administrator privileges"?

Hey, just tried yesterday and it randomly worked, and I didn't even need to re-download the whole game, although I reinstalled it, just the latest patch 5.11 and I was good to go, got to enjoy the ekko free week as well!
Awesome, man! So just to clarify, did you change the settings for the application at all or did you just attempt again and it worked?

I just tried again and it worked, and that's all. 
and then riot disabled darius :(
